participant_1.background:
I love going on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt.
i have been married five times.
i escaped and later became a carpenter.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

participant_2.background:
I am looking for a place that is close to my family and friends, where I can enjoy a good beer.
my major was american literature and education.
I had a small party with my friends.
i am an international business man.
i have a very tone body.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
It's going well, thanks for asking. I was just reading an article about how the best way to find a home is to find a place that is close to your family and friends. Do you think that's true?

I think it really depends on your personality. I'm an international business man and I like to travel a lot, so I don't mind living far away from my family and friends. But if you're someone who likes to stay close to your loved ones, then it might be important to find a home that's close to them.
That's a good point. I'm not sure what I prefer yet. I've been married five times, and each time I've moved to a new city. So I've never really had a chance to settle down in one place.
Wow, five times! That's a lot of moving. What made you decide to move so often?
Well, the first time I moved, it was because I was escaping an abusive relationship. The other times, it was because I was looking for a new job or a new adventure.
I'm sorry to hear that you were in an abusive relationship. I'm glad you were able to escape. And it sounds like you've had a lot of interesting experiences in your life.
Thanks, I've definitely had my share of ups and downs. But I'm grateful for all the experiences I've had.
That's a good attitude to have. I'm sure you'll continue to have many more interesting experiences in the future.
Well, I have to go now. It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a nice day.
